name: Jack in the Box - The Collected Works of Jack King-Spooner
name_original: Jack in the Box - The Collected Works of Jack King-Spooner
description:
"These surreal, unforgettable little works will expand your concept of 'games'" LEIGH ALEXANDER, Offworld


A collection of games and soundtracks. These are shorter works, often jam games.


Games include:

  • Blues For Mittavinda (a game about chaos)
  • The Will You Ever Returns (games about hell)
  • Sluggish Morss episodes 2 &3 (games about free will and breakups)
  • Mammoth
  • A trio of obnoxious games about social commentary
  • Mitt Romney and the Case of the Sex Doll ( a game about power)
  • Vessel (a game about adoption)
  • Inventor
  • Bobuda (a distraction game I made for Forth Valley Children's Ward)
  • Some other stuff

It should be noted that allof these games are available for free elsewhere. This is pretty much a donation with some saucy perks and soundtracks.

£3.20 is about $4.99 for my American chums.

Introducing the very limited Physical Jack in the Box!
